title: CPI COMES IN, BTC HOLDS 72
description: Bitcoin (BTC) at $72k and Ethereum (ETH) at $4035, both up 1%. Solana (SOL) rises 3% to $152. Leading gains: TON, XRP, IOTA, FLOW. Bitcoin nears record high with significant ETF investments. Solana sees spike in new users. TON surges 30% with Telegram IPO rumors. Ark Invest offloads $69m in Coinbase stock. Predictions: Bitcoin could outdo gold, potentially reaching $150k. Blast platform's value hits $3bn with higher yields. Biden proposes crypto miner tax. El Salvador profits $84m from Bitcoin. Monad plans $200m raise led by Paradigm.

title: Inside Pink Drainer: Security analyst defends his crypto scam franchise
description:
Security analyst turned wallet-draining kingpin “Pink” defends millions stolen from “participants” who fell victim to his crypto scam kit.

When crypto investor Ronald Mol clicked on an airdrop link shared by a trusted moderator in a Discord channel, little did he know the account had been taken over by a scammer equipped with the notorious Pink Drainer kit. 

I felt like a real dumbass. How could I have been so stupid to fall for this? Mol tells Magazine.

In draining kits, a developer or a team provides cybercriminals with a script alongside a tutorial on how to use it in exchange for a fee.

Read more

title: Crypto mining giant Core Scientific optimistic despite $137.9M revenue dip
description: Core Scientific, a prominent crypto mining firm, has disclosed a decrease in its year-on-year revenues in the fourth quarter (Q4) of 2023. title: Terraform Labs Gains Court Approval for Legal Defense Amid Bankruptcy

title: India’s SEBI Chairperson Urges Faster Settlements to Compete with Crypto
description: To bolster India’s financial markets and prevent investors from migrating to cryptocurrency platforms, Madhabi Puri Buch, chairperson of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI), has issued a stark warning.  Buch emphasized the need for regulated markets to offer instantaneous settlement processes, citing the growing allure of cryptocurrencies, which provide swift transactions and tokenization.
